Uses of Class
info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.postgres_connection.QueryStatement

  • Packages that use QueryStatement 
    Package Description
    info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.postgres_schema
    This package keeps all data about the database schema to store JSON documents in PostgreSQL.
    info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.postgres_schema.search
    A set of classes to generate complex search queries to jsonb documents.

    • Uses of QueryStatement in info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.postgres_schema

      Methods in info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.postgres_schema with parameters of type QueryStatement 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void PostgresSchema.count(QueryStatement statement, CollectionName collection, IObject criteria)
      Fills the statement body and it's list of parameter setters with the collection name and WHERE clause for the SELECT COUNT(*) statement to count the documents in the collection.
      static void PostgresSchema.create(QueryStatement statement, CollectionName collection, IObject options)
      Fills the statement body with the CREATE TABLE sentence and CREATE INDEX sentences to create the desired collection and it's indexes.
      static void PostgresSchema.delete(QueryStatement statement, CollectionName collection)
      Fills the statement body with the collection name for the DELETE statement to delete the document by ID.
      static void PostgresSchema.getById(QueryStatement statement, CollectionName collection)
      Fills the statement body with the collection name for the SELECT statement to find the document by ID.
      static void PostgresSchema.insert(QueryStatement statement, CollectionName collection)
      Fills the statement body with the collection name for the INSERT statement.
      static void PostgresSchema.search(QueryStatement statement, CollectionName collection, IObject criteria)
      Fills the statement body and it's list of parameter setters with the collection name and WHERE clause for the SELECT statement to search the document by it's fields.
      static void PostgresSchema.update(QueryStatement statement, CollectionName collection)
      Fills the statement body with the collection name for the UPDATE statement

    • Uses of QueryStatement in info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.postgres_schema.search

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PagingWriter.write(QueryStatement queryStatement, int pageNumber, int pageSize)
      Writes a PAGING (LIMIT and OFFSET) clause into the query statement.
      void OrderWriter.write(QueryStatement queryStatement, List<IObject> sortMessage)
      Writes an ORDER clause into the query statement.
      void QueryWriter.write(QueryStatement query, QueryWriterResolver resolver, FieldPath contextFieldPath, Object queryParameter)
      Writes the part of the SQL statement body
      static void Conditions.writeAndCondition(QueryStatement query, QueryWriterResolver resolver, FieldPath contextFieldPath, Object queryParameter)
      Writes the AND condition.
      static void Conditions.writeNotCondition(QueryStatement query, QueryWriterResolver resolver, FieldPath contextFieldPath, Object queryParameter)
      Writes the NOT condition
      static void Conditions.writeOrCondition(QueryStatement query, QueryWriterResolver resolver, FieldPath contextFieldPath, Object queryParameter)
      Writes the OR condition.
